Posts.EditableText: I've been trying to save my game...the save button doesn't appear in not just my game but all games, and entering a save command in the text prompt always states either failed to save game (the function works completely fine in the offline editor), or, even when I'm logged in, I've tried multiple other games, atleast 5, that have neither a save button nor does the command save work, usually stating that it has failed to save due to me not being logged in, even though I am. Anyone else having trouble with this? Saving was broken when the site finally was fixed after games not running for two weeks, then it seems to have broken again pretty profoundly. At this point, I'll probably just use the web version as a preview, since saving seems to be something you can't be guaranteed any longer, and just encourage people to download the game. Very disappointing.
